column1: {{- $c := $c.AddColumn "hiPercentThreshold"  "{{ if .ReportSpec.CIS }}{{ if .ReportSpec.CIS.HighThreshold  }}{{ .ReportSpec.CIS.HighThreshold }}{{ else }}100{{ end }}{{ else }}100{{ end }}" }}
{{- $c := $c.AddColumn "medPercentThreshold" "{{ if .ReportSpec.CIS }}{{ if .ReportSpec.CIS.MedThreshold  }}{{ .ReportSpec.CIS.MedThreshold }}{{ else }}50{{ end }}{{ else }}50{{ end }}" }}
